cause.description:
Environment Colorado investigates problems, crafts solutions, educates the public and decisionmakers, and helps Coloradans make their voices heard in local, state and national debates over the quality of our environment and our lives.
1. Colorado should have clean air.
2. Colorado should use more renewable energy.
3. Colorado should utilize more transit solutions.
4. Colorado should grow responsibly.
5. Colorado should preserve its public lands.
cause.mission: Environment Colorado works to protect Colorado's air, water and open spaces.
cause.name: Environment Colorado
